data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Yobe to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yobe, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Yobe to exponentially multiply disciples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, 2,532,400 people live in the state of Yobe. Please, give them 506 new simple churches this year.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Yobe, Nigeria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Warji people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 652,407 believers in the state of Yobe.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Yobe, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary:
the state of Yobe, Nigeria has a population of 2,532,400.

We estimate Yobe has 652,407 people who might know Jesus, 644,430 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,235,563 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Yobe, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Yobe
location.people_groups_list: Jimi, Bi-Gimu, Gyaazi, Kamo, Ziriya, Fulani, Sokoto
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jimi, Bi-Gimu (2,000), Gyaazi (5,000), Kamo (40,000), Ziriya (2,200), Fulani, Sokoto (416,000)
